path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - FunArcade Token - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: esFATToken.sol - Missing necessary events
findings.description: Functions such as `convert()`, `redeem()`, `cancelRedemption()`, `claimRedemption()`, and `changeDuration()` are missing essential events and should add them and emit accordingly.

findings.title: Consider Converting Variables _cap and _checker into Constants
findings.description: Should convert variables _cap and _checker into constants for improved contract clarity.

findings.title: The confusion between owner and msg.sender in the _removeUserRedemptionId() function
findings.description: In cases where there are code changes and `owner` is not equal to `msg.sender`, this function might operate incorrectly and deviate from its intended purpose.

findings.title: Optimizing gas efficiency for the _removeUserRedemptionId() function
findings.description: Optimizing gas efficiency for the _removeUserRedemptionId() function to improve contract performance.
